mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document (title, content, doc_type, category, user_id, is_public, view_count, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{docType}, #{category}, #{userId}, #{isPublic}, #{viewCount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, doc_type=#{docType}, category=#{category}, user_id=#{userId}, is_public=#{isPublic}, view_count=#{viewCount}, create_time=#{createTime}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, doc_type, category, user_id, is_public, view_count, create_time, update_time FROM document WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, title, content, doc_type, category, user_id, is_public, view_count, create_time, update_time FROM document ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, title, content, doc_type, category, user_id, is_public, view_count, create_time, update_time FROM document WHERE user_id=#{userId}
